title: The Complete Works of Scopeboy
description:
These are the complete works of Scopeboy, and his group Black Car Collective. 

He predominately produced electronic music in the late 90s to mid-2000s, and has since released his works under creative commons.

Album 1: Kill the Lights (1999)
1. Intro
2. Powerhouse
3. The Film (Nihyaku-San-Kochi)
4. P-30
5. A Place With No Doors
6. Jason Break
7. Clydeside Expressway
8. Untitled
9. Outro

Album 2: Breakdown Service (2000)
1. Radio Intro
2. Illfusion
3. Tomorrow's World
4. Tungstene 608
5. Forest of Sensors
6. Milk
7. Software Glitch

Album 3: Way of the Bedroom Worrier (2006)
1. Watch Dem Frequency
2. Disintegrator
3. Pictures of the Floating World
4. Triumph 2000
5. Way of the Bedroom Worrier
6. Snow?
7. Santa Pod is a Place of Drifting Quiet
8. Clydeside Expressway
9. Rochelle Salt

Album 4: Scopeboy Unreleased (2007)
1. Radio Teletype
2. Hackers on Steroids
3. Booty Shifter
4. 20 Bomber (Live)
5. Time and Motion
6. Colorado Springs Dub
7. Cloud Engineering
